SELECT custcom_id AS custcomId, vend_id AS vendId, custcom_name AS custcomName, biz_no AS bizNo, biz_addr AS bizAddr, biz_tel AS bizTel, biz_fax AS bizFax, psch, psch_tel AS pschTel, psch_email AS pschEmail, rpstr, rpstr_tel AS rpstrTel, b_s_ty AS bSTy, crea_dt AS creaDt FROM tb_custcom WHERE 1 = 1
AND custcomName LIKE '%' || #{custcomName} || '%'
ORDER BY crea_dt DESC
